text: @marcorubio 40% of hospitalizations are positive for COVID19 but hospitalized for something else isn’t good news. Are they pre-symptomatic, or asymptomatic? What’s going on with the other 60% of hospitalizations? Symptomatic? Negative?How about a Venn diagram to clear up your shady stats?
